media/user/SCRAPE/test/2022-09-blue-sabbath-black-cheer/extracted/Blue Sabbath - Sickly Weaklings/03 Prelude To Empty
Blue Sabbath Black Cheer - For The Sickly Weaklings
Blue Sabbath Black Cheer - For The Sickly Weaklings

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 18, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Rumbling, gurgling, ominous noisescapes from BLUE SABBATH BLACK CHEER, an outfit with uncanny and innate ability to create alternate sonic realities in the space of one cassette. In this example, Sickly Weaklings carries you through a torturous (internal) chamber. Meant to be experienced as one journey, the progression from presentation (For The Sickly Weakling") to realization ("Disgusting Body") to resignation ("Prelude To Empty") and finally termination ("Empty") is absolutely suffocating. Just as intended. FOR THE SICKLY WEAKLINGS
